page.title: 15A Gretna Marriage
page.content: { {Carrol Anne Minchin}and{Julian Mark {Thomas Pollit}came from Failsworth,{ {Manchester}to Gretna on 3/5/85 to get married and visit the Old Smiddy which is the original place of marriage.They thought the registrar's ceremony was lovely and that Gretna was a beautiful place. They came to Gretna because they wanted a more romantic wedding and because of it's fame. They had previously been to{Gretna} before for their Best Man's wedding on 27/3/85.They thought{Gretna}was much nicer than they had expected and it had given them a lovely start to their married life.
